title: Dashboard — Remove Shoots/Moodboard metric block
description: Remove the 'Upcoming Shoots and Mood Board Items' metric card from the dashboard top row. Retain 'Searches This Month' and 'Total Clients'. Ensure grid reflows cleanly.
acceptanceCriteria: 'Upcoming Shoots and Mood Board Items' card removed
Grid reflows cleanly with remaining cards

steps.details: Find the metrics grid in app/admin/dashboard/page.tsx. Identify the card for 'Upcoming Shoots and Mood Board Items'.

steps.description: Remove the card JSX and data fetching
steps.details: Delete the card component and any associated data query (e.g., shoots count, moodboard items count). Remove unused imports.
Ensure remaining cards (Total Client Searches, Searches This Month, Total Clients) distribute evenly. May need to adjust grid-cols from 4 to 3.

technicalNotes: Check if the removed metric data is fetched in a shared query — only remove the specific field, not the entire query
